sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/services/authentication.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { isAuthenticated: boolean = false; userName: string = ''; constructor(private authService: AuthService) {} ngOnInit() { // Check the user's authentication status when the component initializes this.checkAuthenticationStatus(); } // Function to check the user's authentication status checkAuthenticationStatus() { this.authService.checkAuthentication().subscribe( (data) => { // Set isLoggedIn based on the response this.isAuthenticated = data.isAuthenticated; // Set userName if available if (data.user) { this.userName = data.user.name; } }, (error) => { console.error('Error checking authentication status', error); } ); } }
